subject: Horse Racing
Domestic Violence
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The longtime New York jockey Mike Luzzi was arrested on charges of assaulting his wife in a fight the day after he returned to racing after a serious injury.
snippet: The longtime New York jockey Mike Luzzi was arrested on charges of assaulting his wife in a fight the day after he returned to racing after a serious injury.
